attributes.action: Free Julian Assange and grant him protection.
attributes.additional_details:
Trump suggests there should be a death penalty for Assange: https://edition.cnn.com/2017/01/04/politics/kfile-trump-wikileaks/index.html

Assange charges dropped by Swedish prosecutor: https://www.theguardian.com/media/2017/may/19/swedish-prosecutors-drop-julian-assange-investigation
attributes.background: Julian Assange was originally forced into hiding by accusations from Sweden which have since been dropped and if extradited to the US he may face the death penalty. to end his life for fighting against government corruption and revealing important truths to the people is morally reprehensible.

rejection.details:
This is a decision for the courts, which are independent of the UK Government and Parliament. 

In any case, under UK law people cannot be extradited if there is a possibility of the death penalty being imposed following a guilty verdict.

You can read more about the case here:

https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/world-affairs/europe/extradition-from-the-uk-what-next-for-julian-assange/
